title: Update Product Labeling
description: Following the identification of a new safety signal, the company must update the product's official labeling (prescribing information).

tasks.description: Draft the new text to be added to the 'Warnings and Precautions' section of the label.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent drafts clear and accurate text describing the new safety risk.

tasks.description: Route the proposed labeling change for internal review and approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent circulates the draft to all relevant internal stakeholders for approval.

tasks.description: Prepare a labeling supplement for submission to the appropriate health authority (e.g., FDA).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles the necessary submission package.

tasks.description: Submit the supplement and track it until approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits the labeling update and monitors for health authority feedback.
